# appending(_:)

**Instance Method**

Composes this temporal transformer with another temporal transformer.

## Declaration

```swift
func appending<Other>(_ other: Other) -> ComposedTemporalTransformer<Self, Other> where Other : TemporalTransformer, Self.Output == Other.Input
```
title: appending(_:)
